LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.CONFIRMATION: Please confirm your e-mail address by the link sended.

NEW-USER.TITLE: New User
NEW-USER.CONFIRMATION-1: Please check your inbox for a confirmation email.
NEW-USER.CONFIRMATION-2: Click on the link in the email to confirm your email address.
NEW-USER.CONFIRMATION-3: The confirmation link will be avalible for 24 hours.
NEW-USER.CONFIRMATION-4: After the confirmation you can proceed to the login.

ERRORS.PASSWORD-LENGTH: Password must have at least 6 characters.
ERRORS.USER-LENGTH: User name must have at least 6 characters.
